name: Help Doggo!
description:
Try this relaxing puzzle game, where you have to draw around various physics elements to help little Doggo reach his house!

It looks easy, but it's not... really! Will you get the 3 stars?

*** FEATURES ***

- Cute little Doggo!
- Various physics mechanisms, such as water, ropes, bridges and ... CATS!
- Simple & clever levels for bite size entertainment
- Many levels, many novelties!


By the creators of puzzle hits such as Melissa K. and the Heart of Gold (Game of the month in China, Apple featured Hidden Object and Puzzle game, over 4 million players!); Save the Furries (Apple featured puzzle game, over 1 million players!) and many, many more!
